author: manoj
msg: We don't need the capability to build an acconfig.h anymore; AC_DEFINE
provides everything we need for equivalent functionality. This change
deletes the intrastructure that built acconfig.h.in before.

author: stoddard
msg: Windows: Can now install/uninstall Apache as a service and start/stop apache via
net start and net stop commands. Not extensively tested, so there may be bugs

author: stoddard
msg: Get rid of the C++ style comment.

author: stoddard
msg: Handle -k restart|shutdown command line option from http_main.c

author: fanf
msg: Leave the case-insensitivity stuff as it was before.
